Summary I am a highly collaborative, creative leader, with an outstanding track record in guiding large global organizations through major transformations. I deliver -- and often exceed – business goals and objectives. I am capable of creating a compelling vision and strategy while also developing and executing the detailed plan to ensure impact and results. I have extensive experience in running a global business, with hundreds of millions of dollars in annual revenue, overseeing engineering and software development, business development, sales, marketing, customer acquisition, and bringing products and services to market.  
 
Currently, as the vice president and general manager of the Intel Education Group at Intel Corporation, my team and I have created a business to provide technology solutions for schools and in classrooms around the world. I set global strategy, develop innovative technology solutions, and sell solutions into education institutions, worldwide. With the belief that technology gives students unprecedented advantages for learning and cultivating critical skills, my organization works with local and global partners to develop and effectively deploy education solutions for all learners and educators.  
 
Prior to this role, I was a senior leader in the Corporate Marketing Group, most recently as director of partner marketing leading all aspects of Intel's extensive partner and joint marketing programs, including the world's largest co-marketing program. I also drove the design and led Intel + Vice Media's Creator's Project. In Intel's IT organization, our team created the company's first e-business platform, enabling the global network of distributors and channel partners to work/transact with us through internet-enabled tools and systems.  
 
Before joining Intel in 1995, I spent 10 years working in technology distribution in various capacities including sales, marketing and operations. Summary I am a writer and a traveler. I have lived in on the West and East coasts of the United States, and in Mexico, France, and India. My experience as a writer helps allows me to describe why I see by attaching my observations to tangible details and experiences. Summary I am a writer and a traveler.
